Articles.Content: After getting to play the game for a couple of hours, suddenly I got stuck on Pumping Sim Once and can no longer play the game. Ive tried uninstalling, starting new campaign, starting as admin, starting the .exe. Nothing works. My specs are not the issue : AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor 3.70 GHz /  16gb RAM / 3060. I pray this upcoming Patch can solve this issue for all of us who are struggling with this bug.

The issue dosent solved till now for me even after updating the game, the game crashed and closed on loading screen after creating new campaign.

Unfortunately Can't play it .

Any one can advice ? Or solve this problem after the first patch ?
